name: Kujaku Oh 2
summary: AKA: 孔雀王2 幻影城. Game is based on the popular comic book Kujaku Oh 孔雀王 published between 1985 - 1989. In this horizontal scrolling action game, a user plays the main character Kujaku using various attacking techniques to fight against monsters and ghosts. Final boss is the death soul of Nobunaga Oda.
